attributes.action: Declare the EU referendum void due to evidence of interference by foreign powers
attributes.additional_details:
This is a report on a study recently performed by the City University of London, a piece that has been reported on main stream media.

https://www.city.ac.uk/news/2017/october/13,500-strong-twitterbot-army-disappeared-shortly-after-eu-referendum,-research-reveals
attributes.background: Our democracy was undermined by Russian government interference using fake Facebook accounts to post innacurste stories influencing people to view the EU in a negative light. Leave won by a small margin; now the public are better armed with facts and aware of the above opinion should be retested
